channel.title: jazzahead! Podcast
channel.description: Im Jazzahead-Podcast erfahren Sie einiges über den Jazz in Europa und über die Veranstaltung jazzahead! im Congress Centrum Bremen.
channel.itunes:author: Peter Schulze, JNE
channel.itunes:subtitle: Jazz hat eine neue Adresse!
channel.itunes:summary: Im Jazzahead-Podcast erfahren Sie einiges über den Jazz in Europa und über die Veranstaltung jazzahead! im Congress Centrum Bremen.

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.54
item.description: Live from the jazzahead! 2012 in Bremen Harald Mönkedieck is hosting todays show with live music and interviews with Vinx, Oran Ektin, Benavent-Di Geraldo-Pardo, Felix Falk with Mo' Blow + The Echo-Jazz-Winner Charlotte Greve with Lisbeth Quartet. Also interviews with some jazzahead! 2012-guests like Julia Hülsmann and the Skoda-Award-Winner Siggi Loch.
item.itunes:subtitle: Live from the jazzahead! 2012 in Bremen
item.itunes:summary: Live from the jazzahead! 2012 in Bremen Harald Mönkedieck is hosting todays show with live music and interviews with Vinx, Oran Ektin, Benavent-Di Geraldo-Pardo, Felix Falk with Mo' Blow + The Echo-Jazz-Winner Charlotte Greve with Lisbeth Quartet. Also interviews with some jazzahead! 2012-guests like Julia Hülsmann and the Skoda-Award-Winner Siggi Loch.

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.53
item.description: podcast 53 gives last updates on the eve of the event and has music of Edmar Castaneda, VINX, Simin Tander and Sara Colman
item.itunes:subtitle: podcast 53 gives last updates on the eve of the event ...
item.itunes:summary: podcast 53 gives last updates on the eve of the event and has music of Edmar Castaneda, VINX, Simin Tander and Sara Colman

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.52
item.description: podcast 52 presents the jazzahead! koda clubnight with 17 live music venues in town and music of Studnitzky, Youn Sun Nah, Thomas Siffling, Julian Fischer, ADHD and the Samúel Jón Samúelsson Big Band
item.itunes:subtitle: podcast 52 presents the jazzahead! koda clubnight ...
item.itunes:summary: podcast 52 presents the jazzahead! koda clubnight with 17 live music venues in town and music of Studnitzky, Youn Sun Nah, Thomas Siffling, Julian Fischer, ADHD and the Samúel Jón Samúelsson Big Band

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.51
item.description: podcast 51is about the European Jazz Meeting, the anniversary of Europe Jazz Network, best practice examples as to venues and coaching and it has music from Kepera Trio, Marius Neset, Solveig Slettahjell, Denis Rollins e.a.
item.itunes:subtitle: podcast 51is about the European Jazz Meeting, the anniversary of Europe Jazz Network ...
item.itunes:summary: podcast 51is about the European Jazz Meeting, the anniversary of Europe Jazz Network, best practice examples as to venues and coaching and it has music from Kepera Trio, Marius Neset, Solveig Slettahjell, Denis Rollins e.a.

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.50
item.description: podcast no 50 presents the many facets of the newly introduced program area called German Jazz Expo at jazzahead including music from LebiDerya, Mo' Blow, Céline Rudolph and Schultzing.
item.itunes:subtitle: podcast no 50 presents the many facets of the newly introduced program
item.itunes:summary: podcast no 50 presents the many facets of the newly introduced program area called German Jazz Expo at jazzahead including music from LebiDerya, Mo' Blow, Céline Rudolph and Schultzing.

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.49
item.description: podcast 49 reveals the jazzahead Skoda awardee 2012 and presents this years partner country. Who and which? Check it out!
item.itunes:subtitle: podcast 49 reveals the jazzahead Skoda awardee 2012
item.itunes:summary: podcast 49 reveals the jazzahead Skoda awardee 2012 and presents this years partner country. Who and which? Check it out!

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.48
item.description: Podcast 48 is the first on jazzahead! 2012 and outlines the different program lines of the showcase part of the event, including music from Hildegard lernt fliegen (CH), Journal Intime (F), Sebastian Gille (D), Silvia Perez Cruz (ES) and Edmar Castaneda (USA).
item.itunes:subtitle: Podcast 48 is the first on jazzahead! 2012
item.itunes:summary: Podcast 48 is the first on jazzahead! 2012 and outlines the different program lines of the showcase part of the event, including music from Hildegard lernt fliegen (CH), Journal Intime (F), Sebastian Gille (D), Silvia Perez Cruz (ES) and Edmar Castaneda (USA).

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.47
item.description: This is the podcast on the jazzahead clubnight, where 27 bands were presented in 14 local venues in Bremen, including interviews and music of the Rotterdam Ska Jazz Foundation, Fidan, Pär Lammers, the Jazzinvaders and the Mathias Eick Quintet.
item.itunes:subtitle: his is the podcast on the jazzahead clubnight
item.itunes:summary: This is the podcast on the jazzahead clubnight, where 27 bands were presented in 14 local venues in Bremen, including interviews and music of the Rotterdam Ska Jazz Foundation, Fidan, Pär Lammers, the Jazzinvaders and the Mathias Eick Quintet.

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.46
item.description: Live from the jazzahead! 2011 in Bremen. Harald Mönkedieck is hosting todays show with live music from Partisans, Hamilton de Holanda, Ulrike Haage, Michael Wollny, Trichotomy and Monsieur Dubois. Also interviews with some international guests like Claude Nobs, Gerry Godley, Gail Boyd and Riza Okcu. Next Podcast will be out soon about the jazzahead! Clubnight.
item.itunes:subtitle: Live from the jazzahead! 2011 in Bremen
item.itunes:summary: Live from the jazzahead! 2011 in Bremen. Harald Mönkedieck is hosting todays show with live music from Partisans, Hamilton de Holanda, Ulrike Haage, Michael Wollny, Trichotomy and Monsieur Dubois. Also interviews with some international guests like Claude Nobs, Gerry Godley, Gail Boyd and Riza Okcu. Next Podcast will be out soon about the jazzahead! Clubnight.

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.45
item.description: This is the last update before the start of jazzahead containing info on travel, exhibitors, last additions etc with music you can listen to live, if you are lucky to come to jazzahead.
item.itunes:subtitle: This is the last update before the start of jazzahead
item.itunes:summary: This is the last update before the start of jazzahead containing info on travel, exhibitors, last additions etc with music you can listen to live, if you are lucky to come to jazzahead

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.44
item.description: This edition informs you about the jazzahead Skoda Awardee Claude Nobs and the medical musical symposium, including music from Deep Purple (?!), Kudsi Ergüner and JM Machado.
item.itunes:subtitle: This edition informs you about the jazzahead Skoda Awardee Claude Nobs and the medical musical symposium
item.itunes:summary: This edition informs you about the jazzahead Skoda Awardee Claude Nobs and the medical musical symposium, including music from Deep Purple (?!), Kudsi Ergüner and JM Machado.

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.43
item.description: about goodies for exhibitors, professionals and visitors with music from Ulrike Haage, Rotterdam Ska Jazz Foundation, Pär Lammers and Mathias Eick.
item.itunes:subtitle: about goodies for exhibitors, professionals and visitors
item.itunes:summary: about goodies for exhibitors, professionals and visitors with music from Ulrike Haage, Rotterdam Ska Jazz Foundation, Pär Lammers and Mathias Eick.

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.42
item.description: Learn more about jazzahead's partner country Turkey with music from Sezen Aksu, Ceza, Erkan Ogur, Baba Zula and others
item.itunes:subtitle: Learn more about jazzahead's partner country Turkey
item.itunes:summary: Learn more about jazzahead's partner country Turkey with music from Sezen Aksu, Ceza, Erkan Ogur, Baba Zula and others

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.41
item.description: an introduction to bands who will perform during the Europe Jazz Meeting like Monsieur Dubois, Randi Tytingvag, Pascal Schumacher and Franz von Chossy and a seductive offer for travelling jazz aficionados in the end. Watch out!
item.itunes:subtitle: an introduction to bands who will perform during the Europe Jazz Meeting
item.itunes:summary: an introduction to bands who will perform during the Europe Jazz Meeting like Monsieur Dubois, Randi Tytingvag, Pascal Schumacher and Franz von Chossy and a seductive offer for travelling jazz aficionados in the end. Watch out!

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.40
item.description: The die is cast. All jurys took their decisions on the program of jazzahead 2011. Hear the first exciting items from Switzerland, Finland, Greece, Spain, Brazil, Germany and the Netherlands.
item.itunes:subtitle: All jurys took their decisions on the program of jazzahead 2011
item.itunes:summary: The die is cast. All jurys took their decisions on the program of jazzahead 2011. Hear the first exciting items from Switzerland, Finland, Greece, Spain, Brazil, Germany and the Netherlands.

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.39
item.description: This issue gives you some intital information about jazzahead! 2011, dates, programme lines, extended showcases etc. and some music from our partner country. Which one? Find out and listen.
item.itunes:subtitle: Intital information about jazzahead! 2011
item.itunes:summary: This issue gives you some intital information about jazzahead! 2011, dates, programme lines, extended showcases etc. and some music from our partner country. Which one? Find out and listen.

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.38
item.description: The second podcast from jazzahead! 2010 is all about "German Jazz Meeting". Harald Mönkedieck is talking to Reiner Michalke, Arne Jansen and Julia Hülsmann. Also live music from Nils Wogram Nostalgia Trio, Arne Jansen Trio and Julia Hülsmann Trio, performing at the "German Jazz Meeting". Enjoy.
item.itunes:subtitle: The second podcast from jazzahead! 2010
item.itunes:summary: The second podcast from jazzahead! 2010 is all about "German Jazz Meeting". Harald Mönkedieck is talking to Reiner Michalke, Arne Jansen and Julia Hülsmann. Also live music from Nils Wogram Nostalgia Trio, Arne Jansen Trio and Julia Hülsmann Trio, performing at the "German Jazz Meeting". Enjoy.

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.37
item.description: Live from the jazzahead! 2010 Harald Mönkedieck is hosting todays show with live music from Flat Earth Society, Miyeon Park, Charlie Musselwhite + Ilhan Ersahins Instanbul Sessions. Also interviews with some international guest like Enzo Vizzone (Egea Music, Italy) and John Gilbreath (Earshot Jazz, USA). Next podcast will be out tomorrow about the German Jazz Meeting.
item.itunes:subtitle: Live from the jazzahead! 2010
item.itunes:summary: Live from the jazzahead! 2010 Harald Mönkedieck ist hosting todays show with live music from Flat Earth Society, Miyeon Park, Charlie Musselwhite + Ilhan Ersahins Instanbul Sessions. Also interviews with some international guest like Enzo Vizzone (Egea Music, Italy) and John Gilbreath (Earshot Jazz, USA). Next podcast will be out tomorrow about the German Jazz Meeting.

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.36
item.description: this final podcast before jazzahead updates you regarding evening program, Overseas Night and exhibitors. It holds music of Le Bocal (France) playing Frank Zappa, of Gerardo Nunez (Spain), John Thomas Trio (Malaysia) and Jean-Nicolas Trottier (Canada).
item.itunes:subtitle: evening program, Overseas Night and exhibitors
item.itunes:summary: this final podcast before jazzahead updates you regarding evening program, Overseas Night and exhibitors. It holds music of Le Bocal (France) playing Frank Zappa, of Gerardo Nunez (Spain), John Thomas Trio (Malaysia) and Jean-Nicolas Trottier (Canada).

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.35
item.description: podcast 35 deals with the Skoda award and awardee (guess who?), the Overseas Night, the conference topics, various presentations and contains music of Don Ellis, John McLaughlin, Miyeon + Park and the Electro-Beatniks.
item.itunes:subtitle: Skoda award, Overseas Night, conference topics, various presentations and music
item.itunes:summary: podcast 35 deals with the Skoda award and awardee (guess who?), the Overseas Night, the conference topics, various presentations and contains music of Don Ellis, John McLaughlin, Miyeon + Park and the Electro-Beatniks.

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.34
item.description: podcast number 34 introduces the exciting late night program with music of Flat Earth Society, Emilio Solla, Anne Paceo, Lansiné Kouyaté and David Neerman, Stéphane Kerecki and Schneeweiss
item.itunes:subtitle: podcast number 34 introduces the exciting late night program
item.itunes:summary: podcast number 34 introduces the exciting late night program with music of Flat Earth Society, Emilio Solla, Anne Paceo, Lansiné Kouyaté and David Neerman, Stéphane Kerecki and Schneeweiss

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.33
item.description: podcast 33 updates information on the trade fair and its surroundings, the exhibitors and early bird conditions for professionals. And you hear fabulous music from Schneeweiss und Rosenrot, Ilhan Ersahin and Arne Jansen.
item.itunes:subtitle: podcast 33 updates information on the trade fair and its surroundings
item.itunes:summary: podcast 33 updates information on the trade fair and its surroundings, the exhibitors and early bird conditions for professionals. And you hear fabulous music from Schneeweiss und Rosenrot, Ilhan Ersahin and Arne Jansen.

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.32
item.description: Podcast no. 32 deals with the German Jazz Meeting and contains music from Henning Sieverts, max.bab, Michael Wollny, Andromeda Mega Express Orchestra and others.
item.itunes:subtitle: Podcast no. 32 deals with the German Jazz Meeting
item.itunes:summary: Podcast no. 32 deals with the German Jazz Meeting and contains music from Henning Sieverts, max.bab, Michael Wollny, Andromeda Mega Express Orchestra and others.

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.31
item.description: this is the initial podcast that introduces jazzahead! 2010 in general and some of its changes, includes music from Karen Young, Eve Beuvens, Nils Wogram and John McLaughlin.
item.itunes:subtitle: initial podcast jazzahead! 2010
item.itunes:summary: this is the initial podcast that introduces jazzahead! 2010 in general and some of its changes, includes music from Karen Young, Eve Beuvens, Nils Wogram and John McLaughlin.

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.30
item.description: podcast 30 gives you a short resume of what happened at jazzahead 2009, has some statements of international guests and presents some live-music takes recorded during the European Jazz Meeting with Hélène Labarriere, Giulia Valle, Marc Ayza and Arun Ghosh.
item.itunes:subtitle: a short resume of jazzahead 2009
item.itunes:summary: podcast 30 gives you a short resume of what happened at jazzahead 2009, has some statements of international guests and presents some live-music takes recorded during the European Jazz Meeting with Hélène Labarriere, Giulia Valle, Marc Ayza and Arun Ghosh.

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.29
item.description: It is the 2nd day on jazzahead! 2009 and we are talking to this years Skoda Award Winner Norma Winston, with Frederika Stahl, Zoom and some of the exhibitors, also live music from jazzhead! 2009 featuring Norma Winston, Frederika Stahl, Farmers Market and LaKaffehausAvantgarde.
item.itunes:subtitle: Exhibition Saturday
item.itunes:summary: It is the 2nd day on jazzahead! 2009 and we are talking to this years Skoda Award Winner Norma Winston, with Frederika Stahl, Zoom and some of the exhibitors, also live music from jazzhead! 2009 featuring Norma Winston, Frederika Stahl, Farmers Market and LaKaffehausAvantgarde.

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.28
item.description: We are live at the jazzahead! 2009. Axel P. Sommerfeld is hosting todays show with live music from Arve Henriksen, Shreefpunk and Defunkt. Also interviews with Claude Nobs and some international guests. Next Podcast will be out tomorrow from the exhibition saturday.
item.itunes:subtitle: Exhibition Friday
item.itunes:summary: We are live at the jazzahead! 2009. Axel P. Sommerfeld is hosting todays show with live music from Arve Henriksen, Shreefpunk and Defunkt. Also interviews with Claude Nobs and some international guests. Next Podcast will be out tomorrow from the exhibition saturday.

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.27
item.description: podcast 27 gives some last information before the jazzahead itself starts in a week's time. It has newest recordings of the Yaron Herman Trio, Pascal Schumacher and Brass Jaw.
item.itunes:subtitle: podcast 27 gives some last information before the jazzahead itself starts
item.itunes:summary: podcast 27 gives some last information before the jazzahead itself starts in a week's time. It has newest recordings of the Yaron Herman Trio, Pascal Schumacher and Brass Jaw.

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.26
item.description: This podcast introduces the opening Norwegian Jazz Night and some more of the European Jazz Meeting with music of Arve Henriksen, Helge Sunde, Beady Belle and Huw Warren.
item.itunes:subtitle: This podcast introduces the opening Norwegian Jazz Night and some more of the European Jazz Meeting
item.itunes:summary: This podcast introduces the opening Norwegian Jazz Night and some more of the European Jazz Meeting with music of Arve Henriksen, Helge Sunde, Beady Belle and Huw Warren.

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.25
item.description: This podcast deals with the festival, the exhibition and the medical symposium at jazzahead and contains music of Defunkt, Portico Quartet, Fredrika Stahl, John Abercrombie and Susi Hyldgaard
item.itunes:subtitle: This podcast deals with the festival, the exhibition and the medical symposium

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.24
item.description: This podcast introduces the jazzahead Skoda awardee Norma Winstone and includes some as yet unreleased recordings of Shreefpunk and Pascal Schumacher.
item.itunes:subtitle: jazzahead! podcast 24
item.itunes:summary: This podcast introduces the jazzahead Skoda awardee Norma Winstone and includes some as yet unreleased recordings of Shreefpunk and Pascal Schumacher.

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.23
item.description: jazzahead! podcast 23 informs you about some of the conference topics and musically brings you up to date regarding the late night program with some forward looking German projects like LaKaffeehausAvantgarde
item.itunes:subtitle: jazzahead! podcast 23
item.itunes:summary: jazzahead! podcast 23 informs you about some of the conference topics and musically brings you up to date regarding the late night program with some forward looking German projects like LaKaffeehausAvantgarde

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.22
item.description: Podcast 22 initially deals with the European Jazz Meeting and the late night program at jazzahead! 2009 with music of Octoposse, Arun Ghosh, Pascal Schumacher and others and gives a hidden hint to next year's Skoda award. Watch out!
item.itunes:subtitle: Podcast 22 initially deals with the European Jazz Meeting
item.itunes:summary: Podcast 22 initially deals with the European Jazz Meeting and the late night program at jazzahead! 2009 with music of Octoposse, Arun Ghosh, Pascal Schumacher and others and gives a hidden hint to next year's Skoda award. Watch out!

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.21
item.description: This is the initial podcast introducing jazzahead! 2009 with some basic information about the event and, of course, some nice music that will be put on at jazzahead!'s evening concerts. Did you subscribe already?
item.itunes:subtitle: This is the initial podcast introducing jazzahead! 2009
item.itunes:summary: This is the initial podcast introducing jazzahead! 2009 with some basic information about the event and, of course, some nice music that will be put on at jazzahead!'s evening concerts. Did you subscribe already?

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.20
item.description: This is a résumé of the elapsed jazzahead with some help from Stuart Nicholson, ENJA's Matthias Winckelmann among others and live recordings of Jef Neve, Nik Bärtsch, Cyminology, Yaron Herman a.o.. Plus: the new date of jazzahead! 2009. Watch out!
item.itunes:subtitle: This is a résumé of the elapsed jazzahead with some help from Stuart Nicholson, ENJA's Matthias Winckelmann among others and live recordings of Jef Neve, Nik Bärtsch

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.19
item.description: Our last Day at this years jazzahead! 2008 fair with live music from Jazzkamikaze and Yaron Hermann, Interviews with Yaron Herman, John Cumming, Oliver Heinz and Managing Director of jazzahead! Hans-Peter Schneider. See you at jazzahead! 2009.
item.itunes:subtitle: Our last Day at this years jazzahead! 2008 fair with live music from Jazzkamikaze and Yaron Hermann, Interviews with Yaron Herman, John Cumming, Oliver Heinz and

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.18
item.description: The second day at jazzahead! 2008 with music from Enders Room, Nik Bärtsch, also an interview with Nik Bärtsch and Heino Freiberg from ECM Records, a talk to our intl. guest from Korea and Kasakhstan and a chat about the German Jazz Meeting with two from the Carsten Daerr Trio.
item.itunes:subtitle: The second day at jazzahead! 2008 with music from Enders Room, Nik Bärtsch, also an interview with Nik Bärtsch and Heino Freiberg from ECM Records

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.17
item.description: Welcome to our first edition of this years jazzahead! podcast live from the fair. Chrissie Loock will be your host for the next 3 days, full of interviews and music from the artists, performing at jazzahead! 2008. In this podcast: the Skoda Award 2008 for Karsten Jahnke, music from Thärichens Tentett, the Wallace Roney Group and interviews with representivs from Austria, France, Spain and the Netherlands.
item.itunes:subtitle: Welcome to our first edition of this years jazzahead! podcast live from the fair. Chrissie Loock will be your host for the next 3 days, full of interviews and music

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.16
item.description: In this last to jazzahead podcast you get some last minute infos about how to register, how to find venues etc with music from Thärichen's Tentet, Hans Ulrik, Jazz Big Band Graz, Tom Bancroft and Enders Room.

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.15
item.description: In today's podcast the laureate of the jazzahead!/Skoda award is revealed. Check it out! With music from Jazzkamikaze, Wallace Roney, Das Wilde Fest and Cyminology.

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.14
item.description: Today's podcast shows how to become a better human being through music. No, just kidding. It is about the symposium on the social relevance of music education. Music: Shreefpunk Plus StringsMarilyn Mazur, Laia Genc Liaison Tonique, Matthieu Donarier.
item.itunes:subtitle: Today's podcast shows how to become a better human being through music. No, just kidding. It is about the symposium on the social relevance of music

item.description: Check this update of the evening festival program with some exciting music from Wallace Roney, Marilyn Mazur and others and some brand new stuff from Nik Bärtsch.

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.9
item.description: Welcome to the jazzahead!Podcast. Willkommen zum jazzahead! Podcast. Und weil sich jazzahead! international versteht, ab sofort in englisch. In today's edition: the philosophy behind jazzahead!, music from Trilok Gurtu and Arke String Quartet, Big Band Graz and Nick Bärtsch's Ronin

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.8
item.description: Exklusiv in diesem Podcast: Mittschnitte von Oddarrang, Mathias Eick und Band Motif, Wildbirds und Peacedrums sowie Misses Conception, live aufgenommen bei der jazzahead 07! Im Gespräch mit Peter Schulze sind Hans Peter Schneider, Prof. Uli Beckerhoff und Jens Neumann, über die jazzahead! 07 und 08, Jazz und Kritik sowie Jazz und Förderung.
item.itunes:subtitle: Exklusiv in diesem Podcast: Mittschnitte von Oddarrang, Mathias Eick ...
item.itunes:summary: Exklusiv in diesem Podcast: Mittschnitte von Oddarrang, Mathias Eick und Band Motif, Wildbirds und Peacedrums sowie Misses Conception, live aufgenommen bei der jazzahead 07! Im Gespräch mit Peter Schulze sind Hans Peter Schneider, Prof. Uli Beckerhoff und Jens Neumann, über die jazzahead! 07 und 08, Jazz und Kritik sowie Jazz und Förderung.

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.7
item.description: Heute: Jazz for Kids, Momo auf der jazzahead!, Kenny Wheeler und John Taylor, Mathias Eick über Musikunterricht in der Schule, Interview mit Prof. Urlich Beckerhoff, Sybille Kornitschky über die jazzahead! 2007, einem Exklusiven Interview mit Mike Dibb und die Frage: Was ist eigentlich Jazz? Axel P. Sommerfeld und Jens Neumann verabschieden sich von der Messe und sagen:... Hallo jazzahead 2008....

item.title: jazzahead! Podcast Nr.6
item.description: Heute mit einem amüsanten Vortrag von Prof. Dr. Dr. Manfred Spitzer über Musik im Kopf, einem Interview mit Rigmor Gustafsson, Konferenz-Critics, dem Thema deutsche Jazz-Förderung und einem besonderen Highlight: ein exklusiver Auszug aus der Probe von Arve Henriksen und der Deutschen Kammerphilharmonie.
